import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export const ChatUserRender = (object) => { const link = `/message/dm/${object.object._id}`; return(
{object.object.name}
) } export const ChatDMRender = (Objects) => { let { id } = useParams(); //const socket = io("ws://localhost:5000") const name = Objects.Objects.find(account => account._id === id).name return(
  {name}
) }
